history.proof: intros l l' H. induction H. - qsimpl use: rt1n_refl. - apply clos_rt_rtn1_iff. qsimpl use: DDS_dup,rt1n_refl.

The reference l' was not found in the current environment.

In environment A : Type A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y} xs : list A p : A ys : list A Unable to unify "dup_drop_step ?M1762 (?M1763 :: ?M1762)" with "clos_refl_trans (list A) dup_drop_step (xs ++ p :: ys) (xs ++ ys)".

original: intros l l' H. induction H. - apply rt1n_refl. - apply rt1n_trans with (y := p :: l'). + apply rt1n_one. apply DDS_dup. auto. + auto. - apply rt1n_trans with (y := xs ++ ys'). + apply rt1n_one. apply DDS_drop. auto. + auto.
